transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello ha ji.

Customer: ha bhabhi ji
Executive: ji boliye
Customer: Branshu bol raha hu sir Branshu bol raha hu India mart se ha boliye
Customer: ek senior hai wo kuch baat karna chah rahe the aapse aapke profile ke regarding
Executive: ek minute baat kar lijiye aap
Executive: hello
Customer: ha ji
Executive: ha ji hello ha sir
Executive: matlab morning me bhi try kiya tha aapko sir isme wahi keh raha tha sir services wagera me sir transu se baat hui hogi to koi dikkat to nahi aa rahi sir services me
Customer: kisne
Executive: sir India mart ke services me koi issue to nahi aa raha na aapko services use karne me
Customer: nahi nahi
Executive: thik hai thik hai transu ka number aapke pass hai sir koi dikkat hoti hai koi pareshani hoti hai aap inse baat kar sakte hai aur ek feedback dena tha sir aapko aapke pass calls kafi miss ho rahi hai buyer ki to please usko attend kijiye buyer ka
Customer: thik hai
Executive: thik thik sir okay
Executive: ha aapka bhi renewal aane wala hai sir february ya march ke mahine me aayega abhi teen char mahine bache hue hai to isko use kar lijiye aur acche se
Customer: thik hai sir
Executive: thik hai ek feedback aayega sir aapka hamare liye please usko satisfied pe click kar dijiyega aap
Customer: thik hai sir
